str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Plural
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: It becomes, is fitting to, is right. Apparently a primary verb; to tower up, i.e. to be suitable or proper.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: From hugies; to have sound health, i.e. Be well; figuratively, to be uncorrupt.
